price: The wicked will see the Fire and realize that they are bound to fall into it, and they will find no escape from it.
arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
